title: Real-World Learning-Based Mathematical Modeling Projects for Engineering Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary engineering knowledge and high school-level mathematics
context.additional_context: Project-based solving of real industrial field problems through mathematical modeling. Implementation of practical evaluation systems via learner collaboration

learning_goals: Learners acquire the ability to transform real-world industrial problems into mathematical models.
Learners collaboratively complete three or more authentic learning tasks with team members in a PBL environment.
Learners conduct two or more reflective evaluations of their modeling processes through formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
